title: Italian Lunch Menu - Pietro's Restaurant
text: Lunch Menu Online Ordering Available APPETIZERS SOUP OF THE DAY | $7.50 CHICKEN WINGS | $15.50 Tossed in hot sauce TOASTED RAVIOLI (10) | $12.50 A St. Louis original TOASTED SPINACH BALLS (10) | olives SPINACH SALAD | $14.75 Garden spinach with shrimp, egg, bacon, fresh mushrooms, cheese and croutons, topped with our special dressing COBB SALAD | $14.75 Ham, turkey, bacon, egg, with crumbled Blue cheese and cheddar on a bed of lettuce, with your choice of dressing BURGERS & WRAPS HAMBURGER | $13.50 Add cheese $1.00 BBQ CHEDDAR CHEESE BURGER WITH BACON | $14.95 PIETRO’S PATTY MELT | $14.95
